storyInfo: The nightmarish forest is once again shrouded in darkness. The aging hunter once again pursues his quarry. His madness wipes away all, until he glimpses a destined shadow.

attributes.content: Wake up, old timer.
Wet. Warm. Soft. The soil is flowing.
Silent. Gentle. Slow. The mind is sinking.
Urgh...
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: Get up.
It'll get away.
The scorching moonlight pours down upon his skull. The soil beneath him seems to boil. The heat chases his fading consciousness out of the void. He opens his eyes to the stinging pain.
Yes. That's it. Stand up.
How... how long have I been out?
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: Five minutes.
Five minutes. I've wasted too much time.
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: One second can be the difference between life and death.
But this time, you have time.
Go to the lake. Retrieve your spear.
The hunter's spear—his companion, his lifeline—lies half-submerged in the lake.
He does not remember why he laid it down. It was akin to laying down his own life.
He pulls it out from the mud. The blood on its tip remains fresh.
You should wash your face. You've been chasing it for three days and three nights.
Only three days. I'm not that old.
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: Where did the beast run off to?
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: It's wounded. It can't have gone far. It must be licking its wounds in some corner of the forest.
The forest...
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.text: He casts his gaze towards the forest.
The tree trunks reach upwards like spinal columns, with ribs spreading out like branches and countless slabs of meat hanging from them.
Dark fat piles up in the air, filled with sanguine fluids threatening to pour out at any moment.

attributes.content: You're scared.
Nonsense.
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: You're filled with doubt.
Doubt as to whether it's you moving forward, or the forest quickly approaching, with fangs bared.
You want to turn around and run.
Impossible.
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: Don't try to hide it. I see it all.
But I'm not here to dispute your fear.
The forest is a monster. Everything about it is worth fearing.
A monster...
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: A monster straight out of a nightmare, spreading its gaping jaws wide, tearing life to pieces. That's the true face of the forest.
Yes, so it is.
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: But it is not undefeatable.
Do you remember the last you saw of me?
I do. I'll never forget.
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: Are you angry?
Yes, so angry that I'm trembling from head to toe, my nails digging deep into my palms.
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: Yes. Be angry. You need that anger.
You will feel fear, panic, and pain, but rage will wash it all away.
Nothing can stand in the path of your fury. Your wrath will sweep away the forest.
Yes. I shall rage, pull the forest's fangs from its jaws, and cut off its claws.
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: I will do to it what it did to you.
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: Good. There are blood trails over there. Take a look.
Tch...
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: It's still warm. It bleeds. Its wounds have reopened.
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: The trail stops here.
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: See the scratch marks on the trees? Observe carefully.
I don't need you to tell me.
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: The marks are deep. It must have clawed at it many times, ripping away the bark.
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: At the edge of the marks are blood-soaked hairs. There are more on the ground.
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: These creatures are becoming more and more cunning.
It knows the blood will give it away. It rubbed sawdust into its wounds to stop the bleeding, then cut the existing marks deeper to hide its trail.
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: But a beast is just a beast. A bar of graphite will leave its trail on paper, no matter how thin it is.
The fruits of the cockleweed cling to the fur of passing animals, hitching a ride on them.
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: Look at the path they have laid for us. Ha...
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: It entered that cave.
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: What's that? I've never heard such a sound...
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: Looks like we have a new friend.
The sound of its voice excites me. Could it be...?
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: Be patient. A hunter should stay focused on the quarry at hand.
I know you're in there.
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: Your wounds hurt. You're bleeding. Why won't licking stop it?
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: How does it feel to be the prey?
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: Do you remember the lives you tore apart with your claws and fangs? Did you ever imagine how they felt?
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: Now, you're just like me, tired and hungry. This is the end for both of us.
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: There is nowhere to run. No choice but to fight.
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: Ah, I understand now. Perhaps you need some stimulation.
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: (Squeezes the sharp spear point, allowing the blood to flow down his arm)
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: Do you smell that? It's the scent of blood you love so much. The scent of life. You can't wait to bare your fangs at it.
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: Kill me, and this body is yours to do with as you please.
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: But can you manage it?
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: Brute! Still with such strength!
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: Blasted thing... Get your stinking mouth away from me!
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: Defeated so easily.
Look at you. How pathetic.
All that talk of killing the beast, yet here you are, powerless before it. Even as it lies wounded and near death.
Pounced on and torn apart like a rag. What a fitting end.
Have all those years of fighting done nothing temper you, Yoshitaka?
No... I'm not done yet.
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: You want to take it down with you.
I was an idiot to think you could.
I can still...
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: No, you can't. You'll die here.
I... won't...
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: Then raise your spear and stab it! Plunge it into its body!
One! Two!
Yes! That's it!
You need anger so hot you'll disregard your own life and everything else.
Yes, for your sake, I need anger so hot I'll disregard everything else.
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: For my sake!
Kill it!
Yes, that's it.
Now stand.
Make it fear you.
Shut up!
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: You! The claws and fangs of this terrible forest.
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: Did you think you were a hair's breadth from killing me?
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: Did you think I'd given up?
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: I'm here! Come at me!
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: Kill me!
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: The hunting spear pierces the beast's throat, and the man's aging body falls to the ground.
A flash of lighting reveals a great shadow beneath the sky. Blazing flames slash through the dark clouds.
He trembles from head to toe, his nails digging deep into his palms.
Yes, that's it. That must be it.
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: A monster I've never seen before... So that's what left you in that state.
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: Of course no ordinary beast could have bested you so easily. Of that I have no doubt.
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: For you...
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: I will recite your name the moment my spear pierces its heart.
attributes.name: Aged Hunter

attributes.content: He closes his eyes.
